Package life.expert.riso.app

Class ShellCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.expert.riso.app.controller.ShellCommands
  • @ShellComponent
@ShellCommandGroup("Drawing Commands")
public final class ShellCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains commands called by the shell. Preconditions: Spring shell instantiated Postconditions: Canvas with added figures Side effects: console/file output Tread safety: Not thread-safe

        @ShellMethod(key="L",
             value="Create a new line from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2). Currently only\n horizontal or vertical lines are supported. Horizontal and vertical lines\n will be drawn using the \'x\' character.")
@ShellMethodAvailability("availabilityCheck")

        @ShellMethod(key="B",
